text: all right today I'm doing beans and

delicious here we go
there's my greens that is just some

about three handfuls any green work
Swiss chard escarole anything like that
I get a jar of Italian white beans

all right drizzle in three by three

fry the garlic
sometimes when you add the garlic to the

it cooks too bit too fast and and anyway

that it's just gonna start just very
gently sizzling and just a little safer

base for our greens which we are gonna
add at this point so just when the
garlic starts to sizzle again it was on
pretty much low medium low all the way
so far throw in your three or four

see now that how they're kind of wilted

my uncle basically does a half of them

five minutes later take off the lid now

like to do is just kind of push against

to high and four to three minutes just
to boil that liquid down and you can
kind of thicken it that way it's fine
just to serve like that no problem so a
few options there at the end depending
on the final texture of the dish and
